'''''The Tolkien Address Book''''' is a blank address book featuring a selection of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s illustrations (from ''[[Pictures by J.R.R. Tolkien]]'') and verse (from ''[[The Hobbit]]'' and ''[[The Return of the King]]''). It was published to celebrate the centenary of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] ([[1892]]-[[1992]]).
==See also==
*''[[The Hobbit Birthday Book]]''
